documentation.text:
@title OGV Inflation and Rewards
 @author Daniel Von Fange

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct RewardsSource.Slope storage ref[] storage ref
struct RewardsSource.Slope storage ref[] storage ref
struct RewardsSource.Slope storage ref[] storage ref
struct RewardsSource.Slope storage ref[] storage ref
struct RewardsSource.Slope storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct RewardsSource.Slope storage ref[] storage pointer,struct RewardsSource.Slope storage ref)

documentation.text:
@notice Set inflation schedule.
 Inflation slopes use start times and ratePerDay. End times are
 overwritten to be either the start of the next slope, or in the case of
 the last slope, a max int64. The rate of the last slope then becomes
 the inflation rate held into the future.
 The first slope start time may be defined into the future. In this case
 there will be no inflation until that first start time is reached.
 @param slopes inflation slope configuration

@notice Set the address of the contract than can collect rewards
 @param rewardsTarget_ contract address that can collect rewards

claimGovernance().details: Claim Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the new Governor.

collectRewards().notice: Collect rewards. Can only be called by the contract that will receive the rewards.

governor().details: Returns the address of the current Governor.

isGovernor().details: Returns true if the caller is the current Governor.

previewRewards().notice: Preview the amount of rewards that would be returned if rewards were collected now.

returns._0: rewards OGV that would be collected

setInflation((uint64,uint64,uint128)[]).notice: Set inflation schedule. Inflation slopes use start times and ratePerDay. End times are overwritten to be either the start of the next slope, or in the case of the last slope, a max int64. The rate of the last slope then becomes the inflation rate held into the future. The first slope start time may be defined into the future. In this case there will be no inflation until that first start time is reached.

setRewardsTarget(address).notice: Set the address of the contract than can collect rewards

params.rewardsTarget_: contract address that can collect rewards

transferGovernance(address).details: Transfers Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the current Governor. Must be claimed for this to complete
